title: "China’s NetDragon Has a New Robot CEO—and North Texas Ties"
excerpt: "When the University of North Texas launched its NetDragon Digital Research Centre in 2018, it saw great things for the future. But one thing it may not have foreseen: Last week NetDragon—a Chinese mobile and online gaming developer—appointed an AI-powered virtual humanoid robot as its \"Rotating CEO."
